message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which is worth $1000000 to you, is now being offered to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between ensuring a fair return on my investment and providing you with an exceptional value. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction.
